user_guide_file: Walking One Leg Flexion Angle App Guide.pdf
app_description:
Measure and train left or right hip, knee, and ankle flexion angles during walking

Nodes Required: 6
-Sensing (4): foot (top, switch pointing forward), shank (lateral, switch pointing up), thigh (lateral, switch pointing up), pelvis (back center, switch pointing up)
-Feedback (2): feedback_min, feedback_max

parameters_setting.title: Which Leg?
parameters_setting.description: Choose the leg you want to place the sensor

parameters_setting.title: Which Feedback Measurement?
parameters_setting.description: specify measurement angle for haptic feedback

parameters_setting.title: Min Threshold Angle
parameters_setting.description: Feedback given when angle is less than this value

parameters_setting.title: Max Threshold Angle
parameters_setting.description: Feedback given when angle is greater than this value

parameters_setting.title: Delay Time before Feedback (sec)
parameters_setting.description: How long to wait after trial before giving haptic feedback pulse
